Attendee Manager module¶

AttendeeManager module for managing attendees in memory.

Manages all attendees in an easily managable manner, not an efficient manner. Attendees must be Attendee objects for ease of use.

Todo

  • Implement all methods

  • Impement datalogging

class attendee_manager.AttendeeManager[source]¶

Bases: object

Managers all attendee objects in a convenient fashion.

__init__()[source]¶

Constructor

add_attendee(attendee: src.attendees.attendee.Attendee, attendee_id: Hashable)[source]¶

Add an attendee.

Parameters

  • attendee (Attendee) – The attendee to add.

  • attendee_id (Hashable) – How to uniquely identify the attendee.

Raises

  • TypeError – if attendee is not an Attendee object.

  • TypeError – if attendee_id is not hashable.

  • ValueError – if an attendee with attendee_id already exists.

get_attendee(attendee_id: Hashable)[source]¶

Get an attendee object from the manager.

Returns a reference to the attendee, not a copy.

Parameters

attendee_id (Hashable) – The unique identifier for the attendee.

Returns

The attendee object.

Return type

Attendee

Raises

KeyError – if attendee does not exist

remove_attendee(attendee_id: Hashable)[source]¶

Remove an attendee from the manager.

Parameters

attendee_id (Hashable) – The unique identifier for the attendee.

Raises

KeyError – if attendee does not exist.

add_attribute(key: Hashable, values: Dict[Hashable, Any] = {})[source]¶

Add an attribute for all attendees.

Useful for adding attribute for all attendees in one line of code. Will overwrite values if attribute already exists.

Parameters

  • key (Hashable) – The key/name of the attribute.

  • values (Dict[Hashable, Any]) – A mapping from attendee ID to initial value of the new attribute. Defaults to empty dictionary (no initialision).

Raises

  • TypeError – if key is not Hashable.

  • TypeError – if values is not a dictionary.

remove_attribute(key: Hashable)[source]¶

Removes an attribute for all attendees.

Useful for removing attribute for all attendees in one line of code. Does nothing if no attendees has the attribute.

Parameters

key (Hashable) – The key/name of the attribute.

Raises

TypeError – if key is not Hashable.
